009package Synthetic_Noise;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.ImageStack;
014import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.HashFun;
017import imagingbook.common.noise.perlin.PerlinNoiseGenNd;
018
019/**
020 * This ImageJ plugin creates a new noise image using a 3D gradient noise 
021 * generator. Several parameters can be adjusted. For details see
022 * Ch. 8 of W. Burger and M. J. Burge. "Principles of Digital Image Processing -
023 * Advanced Methods" (Vol. 3). Undergraduate Topics in Computer Science.
024 * Springer-Verlag, London (2013). https://imagingbook.com
025 * 
026 * TODO: NOT WORKING! Needs to be fixed, results are not plausible!
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2013/05/28
030 */
031
032public class Demo_Perlin_3d  implements PlugIn {
033        
034        static int wx = 300;
035        static int wy = 300;
036        static int wz = 10;             int stepZ = 5;
037        
038        int dim = 3;
039        
040        static int octaves = 6;
041        static int seed = 2;
042
043        static double f_min = 0.01; // f_max / (1 << (octaves-1));
044        static double f_max = f_min * (1 << (octaves-1));
045        
046        static double persistence = 0.5;
047
048        String title = this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " Seed=" + seed;
049        
050        public void run(String arg0) {
051                
052                // choose hash function:
053                HashFun hf = HashFun.create(seed);
054//              HashFun hf = new Hash32Shift(seed);
055//              HashFun hf = new Hash32ShiftMult(seed);
056//              HashFun hf = new Hash32Ward(seed);
057//              HashFun hf = new HashPermute(seed); 
058
059                // create the noise generator:
060                PerlinNoiseGenNd png = new PerlinNoiseGenNd(dim, f_min, f_max, persistence, hf);
061                ImageStack stack = createNoiseImage(wx, wy, wz, png);
062                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus(this.getClass().getSimpleName(), stack);
063                im.setDisplayRange(-0.6,0.6);
064                im.show();
065        }
066        
067        ImageStack createNoiseImage(int wx, int wy, int wz, PerlinNoiseGenNd ng) {
068//              ImagePlus stackImg = 
069//                      NewImage.createFloatImage(title, wx, wy, wz, NewImage.FILL_BLACK);              
070//              ImageStack stack = stackImg.getStack();
071                
072                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(wx, wy);
073                double[] X = new double[dim];
074                IJ.showStatus("creating noise volume ...");
075                for (int z = 1; z <= wz; z++) {
076                        IJ.showProgress(z, wz);
077//                      ImageProcessor fp = stack.getProcessor(z);
078                        FloatProcessor fp = new FloatProcessor(wx, wy);
079                        for (int v = 0; v < wy; v++) {
080                                for (int u = 0; u < wx; u++) {
081                                        X[0] = u;
082                                        X[1] = v;
083                                        X[2] = z * stepZ;
084                                        fp.setf(u, v, (float)ng.NOISE(X));
085                                }
086                        }
087                        stack.addSlice(fp);
088                        // fp.setMinAndMax(-0.6,0.6); //fp.resetMinAndMax();
089                }
090                IJ.showStatus("");
091//              stackImg.setDisplayRange(-0.6,0.6);
092//              return stackImg;
093                return stack;
094        }
095
096}
